Class CommentDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kolyadko.likeit.dao.AbstractDao<java.lang.Long,Comment>
      • com.kolyadko.likeit.dao.impl.CommentDao

  • public class CommentDao
extends AbstractDao<java.lang.Long,Comment>
    This DAO allows perform operations on database with comments
